issue.title: [CF 965] Icon is darker if "all absent" is checked
issue.body:
I've noticed that all my (buff) icons are darker when they are at "Any present" state if I have "All absent" opacity option checked, regardless of that opacity, when I have timer sweep turned off. It's actually the same darkness of the cooldown sweep as if the sweep had gone full 360 degrees (or 0 degrees if inverted). I'll add a screenshot to this post too. I have OmniCC but it doesn't matter if it's enabled or not.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Add a buff icon
2. Check to show "All absent" and some opacity for that
3. Don't use cooldown sweep animation

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
I expect to have the icon appear at a normal color / "luminocity" when the buff is present regardless of whether it's shown or not when the buff is absent.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
v.7.0.2 r6 (ge47e0ef)
